about_the_game:
"Game Designer & Maker" is a cross-platform 2D indie game development software that requires no programming and allows you to create any type of game. The completed games can be exported (permanent feature) as executable files for PC, Mac, and Android, with 100% of the copyright belonging to you. You can freely publish and sell your games online!

P.S. Developed by an independent programmer, the software’s biggest feature is its use of a simplified visual programming method for creating any type of 2D game (unlike common software that only allows for template-based modifications). If you encounter any issues while using it, you can contact me via Steam email. I will continue to develop and optimize the software in the future and look forward to your attention and support :D

Software Features:
- Universal 2D game development tool, with no restrictions on game types
- Built-in frame-by-frame animation editor, skeletal animation editor, and skinning animation editor
- Built-in physics engine, simulating realistic physical movements, collisions, and rebounds
- 2D map editor + 2.5D map (isometric animation) editor, with map tiles supporting animation effects
- Powerful point sprite effects editor, allowing for creation of traditional particle effects like fire, rain, and snow, as well as rendering animations as particles (e.g., flocks of birds, schools of fish, or a horde of zombies)
- Lighting editor, combined with the built-in normal map editor, to create very cool real-time lighting effects
- Effects editor, capable of creating various console-level effects (e.g., real-time fire, clouds, rainbows, lasers, water ripples, etc.)
- AI editor, which is used to create the "soul" of a game, allowing you to make any type of game and templates once proficient with the object AI editor
- Scene editor, used to place your animations and objects into the scene, and clicking the run button completes the game creation
- Finally, once the game is completed, you can export it (permanent feature) as executable programs for PC, Mac, and Android, allowing you to share with friends or publish on major platforms and enjoy the fun of game development

  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3-compliant onboard graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3-compliant onboard graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
